label: carriedInactiveTransportMeans
comment: Details of transport means inactively carried during the transport movement, such as trucks on a Roll-On/Roll-Off (RORO) ferry.

rangeIncludes.comment: Reference to a device or method used to convey people, goods, or other objects from place to place.

domainIncludes.comment: The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
